Pre-Game Insights: Jofra Archer made a return to the big stage at his hometown, Barbados.
Richie Berrington won the toss and opted to bat first.
Scotland's openers George Munsey and Michael Jones scored 90/0 in 10 overs.
England was put in to field first by Scotland.
Post-Match Reflections: The game was called off due to rain.
England and Scotland shared a point each.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Excessive rain led to the match being abandoned after 10 overs per side.
Scotland's openers scored a strong start but the game was interrupted by rain.
Jofra Archer made his comeback in T20 World Cup at Barbados.
